Title: Relates to establishing emergency mental health units
Summary: Relates to establishing emergency mental health units; provides for certification of all emergency mental health units, the creation of regional emergency mental health unit councils, and a New York state emergency mental health unit council to develop minimum training standards for certified emergency mental health units and minimum equipment and communication standards for emergency mental health units.
LawCode: Add Title B Art 11 §§11.01 - 11.11, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing emergency mental health units
